attributes.action: FORCE 'national express east anglia' TO FULLY REFURBISH AND MODERNIZE THE ENTIRE ROLLING STOCK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NXEA are currently using units which are dirty and very old fashioned. It is a huge difference than other operators like South West Trains. We want this fleet fully refurbished and modernized in the near future.
